Package w23assignment2

Class AlarmClock

java.lang.Object
w23assignment2.Clock
w23assignment2.AlarmClock
public class AlarmClock extends Clock
This class inherits Clock and overrides Clock itself to provide examples of pre-defined alarm clocks. NOTE: This will only gather pre-defined time.
Author:
Nouraldin Hassan

  • Method Details

    • getAlarm

      public String getAlarm()
      Gets the alarm set from hours and minutes. NOTE: same function as WorldClock.getTime()
      Returns:
      hours and minutes in hh:mm format.

    • setAlarm

      public void setAlarm(int hours, int minutes)
      Sets the alarm to a pre-defined value.
      Parameters:
      hours - the hours of the alarm clock
      minutes - the minutes of the alarm clock

    • convertMinutesToHours

      public int convertMinutesToHours()
      Converts minutes above 60 to an hour, followed by extra minutes (120 minutes to 1 hour and 30 minutes)
      Returns:
      the converted minutes

    • getTime

      public String getTime()
      Gets the specified time in hours and minutes for the alarm clock. Also supplies function to the alarm clock.
      Overrides:
      getTime in class Clock
      Returns:
      hours and minutes in hh:mm format, and extra text if needed to indicate alarm cleared as a result of time reached or exceeded
      See Also:
      • Clock.getTime()
